name: Owl's Wisdom, Mass
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook. © 2009, Paizo Publishing, LLC
target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text:
EFFECT

Range close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Target One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

EFFECT

This spell functions like owl's wisdom, except that it affects multiple creatures.
target_zh: 每等级一个生物, 任意两者之间的距离不超过30尺
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘枭之睿智 (owl's wisdom)’一般，不过它可以影响复数生物。
